subject: Dear Client,
body:
Dear Client,
Your name is among 10 victims of fraud listed for compensation by IMF/UNITED NATION through Canada (USD2.5Million  ) Kindly Reconfirm your details
 To Mr.Fred Williams Here ( 
wfred9659@gmail.com
) This will be the last notification about this said compensation development.
1............Your Full Name,
2..........Your Address
3......Your Telephone Number.
4........Your Age
5.........Your Occupation
Yours Sincerely
Dr. Okagba Pius
okagbapius@live.com

subject: Re: Dear Client,
body:
Dear Dr. Okagba Pius,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well. I received your message regarding being listed as a victim of fraud by the IMF UNITED NATION through Canada. This is quite concerning, and I would appreciate any information or assistance you can provide.

Could you please clarify what exactly this listing entails? How did my name end up on this list? Is there any specific incident or case that I should be aware of?

I understand that you are requesting my personal details such as full name, address, telephone number, age, and occupation. Before I proceed with sharing this information, could you please explain how it will be used and why it is necessary in relation to the situation at hand?

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Crystal
